4425887.description: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

48361212.description: "Once you see how the balance is tipped against us—once you see doom coming, inexorable and cold—then you must act." —Arach Jalaal

48361213.description: "We will save and protect anyone who joins Dead Orbit. There is a place on our ships for you." —Arach Jalaal

53159280.description: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.

53159281.description: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.

64236626.description: This one is a real looker.

66875353.description: If they're close enough to see it start, then they'd better run.

94729174.description: "She taught us all to appreciate a good, sturdy axe." —Lord Saladin

137879537.description: It's time for the final bow.

153979396.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

153979399.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

159056377.description: Requiem-45: SUROS invites you to honor the dead.

161537636.description:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.

161537637.description:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

174804902.description: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

191996029.description: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."

204878059.description: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter

218335759.description: What did you trade away to secure passage to the edge?

227548887.description: "Until a ruler arises, we act as simple trustees. Protecting. Receiving. Executing." —Executor Hideo

228424224.description: SUROS invites you to be spontaneous.

233423981.description: Fight. Win. Li- Li- Li- Li- Li- FATAL EXCEPTION HAS OCCURRED AT 0028:C001E36

254156943.description: A rusted rifle you found in the EDZ mine. It's old, but it still works.

273396910.description: "…and after that, there will be time for questions."

276918162.description: The way of the warrior is death.

287042892.description: See the art in what's subtracted.

287042893.description: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.

287042894.description: The promise is in the point of the blade.

293505772.description: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.

301362380.description: "The Great Machine isn't killing us. We're killing ourselves over the Great Machine." —Brivi, transl. from Eliksni

301362381.description: The passage to the Shore is not an easy road.

308332265.description: "Silimar's defense broke more assaults than not. His retribution would shake the ground." —Lord Saladin

324382200.description: "They don't make Dark Age tech like this anymore. Lucky for you I kept all mine." —The Drifter

325519402.description: "Persevere, or die in darkness. The choice is yours." —Emissary of the Nine

334171687.description: "We have a duty to this solar system that goes deeper than blood, deeper than oaths." —Paladin Devi Cassl

339163900.description: Three drops is all it takes.

339343290.description: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.

346136302.description: "It's what gets left out, what gets reemphasized that you have to pay attention to." —Esila, daughter of Sila

408440598.description: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

417164956.description: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1

417474225.description: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.

417474226.description: What is the color of the universe?

432716552.description: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light.

460724140.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

472169727.description:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.

472847207.description: "We will make a new home out among the stars, and then we will know peace. Until that day..." —Arach Jalaal

515224227.description: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

525750263.description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

546372301.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

568515759.description: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.

580961571.description: Hey. You see Cayde around, tell him his gun's ready. —Banshee-44

582335600.description: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

601592879.description: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.

622058944.description: "He was more wolf than Human, we used to say." —Lord Saladin

625672050.description: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!

636912560.description: "No job too tough, if the price is good." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

640114618.description: "What else can we do but take up arms?" —Corsair Amrita Vae

653875712.description: Prepare to back up your boasts.

653875713.description: Make your enemy's strength your own.

653875715.description: SUROS invites you to pick up the pace.

654370424.description: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.

686951703.description: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis

695814388.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

701922966.description: Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.

705774642.description: "We need proper tools if we are to rebuild." —Executor Hideo

711899772.description: I seek my prey in the shadows.

711899775.description: SUROS invites you to revel in the conflict.

717150101.description:
"Stress feedback tests proved successful. We have a solid production-line model on our hands."
—A. Bray

731147177.description: "What am I supposed to put here? 'It's a gun. Kill bad guys with it.'" —Suraya Hawthorne

731147178.description: This one is a real looker.

731147179.description: Defend that which is precious to you.

736901634.description: The age-old chant: The end of days draws nigh.

792755504.description: Three drops is all it takes.

806021398.description: "The Consensus is bigger than the Speaker. Bigger than any of us. It will survive, because it has to." —Commander Zavala, acting head of the Consensus

807192446.description: Forged in honor of Radegast, and righteous rage born anew.

821154603.description: Don't let pride keep you from a good meal.

896923850.description: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.

925326392.description: SUROS invites you to be passionate.

925326393.description: Escort your foes to their defeat.

925326394.description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

930590127.description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

982229638.description: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.

990416096.description: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

1006783454.description: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

1018072983.description: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

1071542914.description: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia

1099433612.description: "Do not fear your doubts. Fight your doubts. Honor them as you would honor your enemies." —Lakshmi-2

1115104187.description: Names mean nothing to the dead.

1128225405.description: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

1159252500.description: A toast to our love for danger. Fear makes victory ever sweeter.

1161276682.description: The second swing is no less deadly.

1177293325.description: Long march. Stone road. Old city. Know the land.

1177293326.description: Taut sails. Wide rivers. Battered towers. Watch the seas.

1177293327.description: Old kings. Sharp swords. Epic songs. Take the throne.

1178397318.description: Do not be afraid. Our fate cannot be taken from us. It is a gift.

1178397319.description: "Do not concern yourself with how many horns I bear." —Lord Shaxx

1178886909.description: Sometimes you forget which side you're on.

1180270692.description: My smile is full of blades.

1180270693.description: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer

1180270694.description: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

1189790632.description: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

1270948323.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

1277015089.description: "On the day our ships are ready, the City will see us blast into the sky." —Arach Jalaal

1280933460.description: "Perun's strikes would hit so fast and true that our enemies wouldn't realize their fate until it was too late." —Lord Saladin

1310413524.description: SUROS reminds you that practice makes perfect.

1310413525.description: Victory is a process, not a finality.

1325579289.description: They were so optimistic about us.

1327264046.description: "We are a long way from home." —Arrha (trans. from Eliksni)

1327432221.description: It was a long time coming. But it wasn't the wait. It was the journey.

1331482397.description: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

1342668638.description: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

1350102270.description: The chill you feel is death.

1364093401.description: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown

1369487074.description: "He was the first to forge arms for the Iron Banner." —Lord Saladin

1392429335.description: Let our monarch's spirit ring out and roar!

1393021134.description: In the dark of night we dream of the Light's return.

1393021135.description: Shed the husk of night and be reborn.

1406475890.description: The lumbering beast stands ready to fight.

1411084669.description: You are the true power on the throne.

1443049976.description: Come between your enemies and their lives.

1447973650.description: Let them sleep. For a long, long time.

1449922174.description: The fire in your eyes reveals all truths.

1457394908.description: Sun's hanging low in the sky.

1457394910.description: Be a pain in their side.

1457394911.description: Place like this ain't home to the faint of heart.

1457979868.description: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane

1490571337.description:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

1502662697.description: Only fools dare enter my kingdom.

1508896098.description: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

1513927136.description: It'll be over before you know it.

1513927137.description: Don't you look at me that way!

1513927138.description: The survivors of that day chose not to remember.

1518042134.description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

1518042135.description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

1523647826.description: "The night sky closes in. We should not be here when the final star fades." —Arach Jalaal

1533499360.description: Make yourself dreadful to your enemies and indispensable to your allies.

1533499361.description: The reign of Light will be long and peaceful.

1533499362.description: I will draw them in, then take them out.

1541131350.description: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

1587439031.description: "No need to dig too deep. Our slumber will not be disturbed." —Arach Jalaal

1595336071.description: SUROS invites you to hold nothing back.

1644160541.description: "It is what she asks of us." —Paladin Kamala Rior

1644162710.description: Your inciting incident is their tragic ending.

1650626964.description: What is the structure of the universe?

1650626965.description: I creep unseen through the darkness.

1650626966.description: You will destroy them one cell at a time.

1669771780.description: SUROS invites you to get back on stage.

1669771781.description: Defeat is inevitable… for someone. Make sure it isn't you.

1669771782.description: Set your eyes on the sky.

1674742470.description:
"I am the autumnal sun,
With autumn gales my race is run."

1678957657.description: Set your eyes on the sky.

1678957658.description: Defeat is inevitable… for someone. Make sure it isn't you.

1678957659.description: SUROS invites you to get back on stage.

1702618248.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

1706536806.description: This is the way things were.

1744115122.description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

1752585070.description: The leader of the pack endures through the harshest conditions.

1760543913.description: It's time to file a complaint.

1773600468.description: A chain reaction of nuclear insolence.

1789347249.description: "Nothing for it once you place your life upon the die." —The Drifter

1813667283.description: "I question the wisdom of our current trajectory." —Arach Jalaal

1825472717.description: "Show them that safe harbor is very far away." —Emissary of the Nine

1833744687.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

1842303080.description: "Do we need another reminder? This world is but a grave." —Arach Jalaal

1843044398.description: "Must consider new ways… What cannot change, dies…" —Variks, the Loyal

1843044399.description: A deal is a deal. Or so you hope.

1864563948.description: A single strike can alter the course of history.

1870979911.description: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin

1873270090.description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

1877183764.description: You stand at the head of the army.

1877183765.description: Drink deep from the cup of destruction.

1879212552.description: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

1885753222.description: "We have to do more than ask for help, Suraya. We have to give them something to believe in."

1891561814.description: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

1909527966.description: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine

1911843789.description: All I need is a little breathing room.

1911843790.description: Before you? I just remember searching. What do you remember from before me?

1927800278.description: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

1940885628.description: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.

1942069133.description: The oldest, shortest words—yes and no—are those which require the most thought.

1960218487.description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

1972985595.description: "With enough altitude, Felwinter's destruction would blanket the field farther than you could see." —Lord Saladin

1977926913.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

1982711279.description: "She soared above the battle and dove in the blink of an eye. If they were still alive, they were the unlucky ones." —Lord Saladin

1983332561.description: Let slip the dogs of war.

1983332562.description: Take your place among the company of heroes.

1988218406.description: "To persuade others, we must show that we act in their interests." —Executor Hideo

1995011456.description: Place like this ain't home to the faint of heart.

1995011457.description: Be a pain in their side.

1995011459.description: Sun's hanging low in the sky.

2014642399.description: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

2034817450.description: "I like to keep my enemies where they can't reach me. I can always find a way to get to them if I have to." —The Drifter

2037589099.description: A loyal servant, equipped to take care of even the biggest messes.

2044500762.description: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

2069224589.description: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.

2071412133.description: "When the dreams begin, it is already too late." —Emissary of the Nine

2084611899.description:
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” 
—Val Ca'uor

2091737595.description:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

2108920981.description: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin

2112909414.description: Slow to shoot, but brutal upon impact.

2130065553.description: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

2145476620.description: Sit down. We need to talk.

2145476622.description: Only you can make it whole again.

2145476623.description: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."

2149166938.description: SUROS invites you to bring back the classics.

2149166939.description: A noble commander of the battlefield.

2154059444.description: "Yeah… I lost a lot of these out on Nessus. Long story. Lots of dead Vex." —The Drifter

2168486467.description: The bad influence in the family.

2186258845.description: Fate will hear your war cry.

2199171672.description: Am I the only one who sees?

2208405142.description: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

2209451511.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

2213848861.description: A modded version of the Cadenza-43, a Guardian standby.

2213848862.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

2248667690.description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

2276266837.description: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

2278995296.description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

2290863050.description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

2295941920.description: "Making guns helps the hours pass. Especially since Suraya never calls…" —Devrim Kay

2319004329.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

2351747816.description: What is the shape of reality?

2351747817.description: SUROS invites you to do it again.

2351747819.description: Here is a way to free your enemies from their earthly tethers.

2362471600.description: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."

2362471601.description: We are small, but we are legion.

2376481550.description: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

2502422772.description: Where does one end and the other begin?

2502422773.description: Do not fear. Be what others fear.

2502422774.description: Listen, and you will hear it.

2502422775.description: No one will escape my web.

2505533224.description: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.

2516360525.description: "You have not yet found your purpose. But it has found you." —Emissary of the Nine

2535939781.description: Fix your eye upon the rising sun.

2545083870.description: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?

2553946496.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

2553946497.description: A standard issue Omolon weapon. City-made.

2575506895.description: Find the beauty in the flame.

2581162758.description: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

2591586260.description: SUROS invites you to pick up the pace.

2591586262.description: Make your enemy's strength your own.

2591586263.description: Prepare to back up your boasts.

2605790032.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

2605790033.description: The power you seek is in your hands.

2605790034.description: Wide rivers. Cold winters. Old songs. Find a way.

2625782212.description: "Those we've lost still linger in every place we look. Earth is no place for the living." —Arach Jalaal

2625782213.description: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal

2650944612.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

2683682446.description: Let the Emperor's gratitude end your foes as swiftly as you have ended his.

2683682447.description: The true Emperor of the Cabal invites you to strike down his faithless foe.

2693941407.description: "To protect us, as she once protected me." —Executor Hideo

2694044460.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

2694044461.description: A modded version of the Daito Cydonia, a Guardian standby.

2694044462.description: A heavily modded version of a SUROS prototype weapon.

2694044463.description: A modded version of the Omolon Jiangshi, a Guardian standby.

2703340117.description: Heroes are not born, but made.

2707464805.description: "Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

2734369894.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

2738174948.description: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal

2812672357.description: We are the eulogy of a lost civilization.

2817949113.description: "Do not let them distract you from your purpose!" —Lakshmi-2

2842493170.description: SUROS invites you to appreciate the classics.

2842493171.description: A modified weapon from the Last City.

2850415209.description: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine

2856683562.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

2860172148.description: SUROS invites you to do it again.

2860172149.description: What is the shape of reality?

2860172150.description: Here is a way to free your enemies from their earthly tethers.

2891976013.description: Let them sleep. For a long, long time.

2896466320.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

2903592984.description: The one thing they can never take away.

2903592986.description:
"I am the shadow that whispers in your…"

"Shut up, shadow."

2907129556.description: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

2928437919.description: The miracle worker for close-range ordnance.

2936850733.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

2936850734.description: Your good heart will lead to great adventures.

2936850735.description: Will the long night ever end?

2957542878.description: "Do you ever wonder who you were, before?"

2961807684.description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

2978016230.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

3005104939.description: "She loved nothing more than a good blizzard." —Lord Saladin

3005879473.description: I sink my teeth into my prey.

3040742682.description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

3116356268.description: Whether times are lean or fat.

3141979346.description: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

3141979347.description: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

3169616514.description: "Sometimes Skorri wouldn't show herself until she was the only one left who could stand." —Lord Saladin

3185293912.description: Find the summit and claim it for your own.

3185293913.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

3185293914.description: A modded version of the SUROS Minuet-42, a Guardian standby.

3188460622.description:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.

3211806999.description: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1

3216383791.description: "I didn't expect to like it here. But the EDZ is growing on me." —Devrim Kay

3222518097.description: A lesson in the art of falling.

3229272315.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

3239754990.description: "Speak briefly and precisely, and what you say will penetrate to the heart." —Executor Hideo

3242168339.description: "We knew it would not be easy." —Paladin Hallam Fen

3246523828.description: You are the wall that defends the people.

3246523829.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

3252697558.description: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

3272713429.description: "To perceive the future from a great distance is both a gift and a promise of triumph." —Lakshmi-2

3285365666.description:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

3285365667.description:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

3297863558.description: Engraved in illuminated letters on the weapon's chassis: THE AWOKEN MADE ME.

3312073052.description: Hold your applause till the end.

3312073053.description: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.

3325463374.description: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

3325744914.description: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

3329842376.description: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2

3334276333.description: "The Barons fight together." —Elykris, transl. from Eliksni

3336215727.description: Remember those who have gone before.

3361694400.description: Light is the fire that burns away the blight.

3361694401.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

3361694402.description: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.

3361694403.description: Stone walls. Dark storms. Ill omens. Stay awake.

3380742308.description: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.

3413074534.description: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray

3413860062.description: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

3413860063.description: By this right alone do I rule.

3419149443.description: I sink my teeth into my prey.

3424403076.description: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

3434507093.description: Silence is better than unmeaning words.

3434629515.description: SUROS invites you to keep it steady.

3435238842.description: "Justice must be true, swift, and utterly impartial." —Executor Hideo

3437746471.description: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

3441197112.description: Your first enemy is the darkness in your own heart.

3441197115.description: Is it possible to measure the infinite?

3501969491.description: "How do you think we got here?" —Avrok, trans. from Eliksni

3549153978.description: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

3550697748.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

3556971406.description: SUROS invites you to reflect upon the dead.

3569842567.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

3580904580.description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

3580904581.description: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

3627718344.description: "Even on the darkest days, victory is in sight."  —An optimist (or a liar)

3627718345.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

3628991658.description: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

3628991659.description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

3649055823.description: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin

3662200189.description: Your first enemy is the darkness in your own heart.

3662200190.description: Is it possible to measure the infinite?

3666954563.description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

3691881271.description: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.

3740842661.description: "I see our path ahead, full of despair and hardship, and I will walk it with joy in my heart." —Sjur Eido

3745974521.description: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay

3745990145.description: Inhale. Exhale. Flash of light. Endless fallout.

3748713778.description: SUROS invites you to light it up.

3748713779.description: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.

3762467076.description: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.

3762467077.description: Stand together and play the song that sounds across the stars.

3762467078.description: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

3762467079.description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

3766045777.description: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

3776129137.description: You are the true power on the throne.

3778520450.description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

3778520451.description: SUROS invites you to kick up your heels.

3792720684.description: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.

3799980700.description: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.

3809805228.description: SUROS invites you to revel in the conflict.

3809805231.description: I seek my prey in the shadows.

3826803617.description: "I dream of a world prepared to fight for its existence." —Lakshmi-2

3844694310.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

3854359821.description: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

3856940575.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

3860697508.description: SUROS invites you to join the dance.

3860697510.description: The City's foes ready themselves for the end.

3886263130.description: "When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

3890960908.description: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

3899270607.description: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

3906357377.description: You will destroy them one cell at a time.

3906357378.description: I creep unseen through the darkness.

3906357379.description: What is the structure of the universe?

3906942101.description: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?

3909683950.description: Do not enter my realm and expect to leave unscathed.

3920811074.description: SUROS invites you to serve up your greatest hits.

3957603605.description: The right thing, for the wrong reasons.

3973202132.description: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

3993415705.description: "In the heat of battle, Guardian, you will know the right choice to make." —Lord Shaxx

4024037919.description: Your inciting incident is their tragic ending.

4036115577.description: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

4077196130.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

4083045006.description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

4094657108.description: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.

4095462486.description: Let everyone fear the gaping maw.

4105447486.description: Night comes for us. We are not ready.

4105447487.description: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

4117693024.description: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider

4124984448.description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

4138174248.description: Can't let the Shore get you down.

4138415948.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

4138415949.description: Wisdom is the greatest power, the dearest treasure.

4138415950.description: You will find your way out of this forest.

4145119417.description: "Perhaps it exists. Perhaps it does not. Either we shall find it, or we shall become it." —Lakshmi-2

4146702548.description: No accounting for where it will fall.

4157959956.description: Long march. Stone road. Old city. Know the land.

4157959958.description: Old kings. Sharp swords. Epic songs. Take the throne.

4157959959.description: Taut sails. Wide rivers. Battered towers. Watch the seas.

4174481098.description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

4193877020.description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

4203034886.description: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

4213221671.description: Do not wait for the sun to rise.

4221925398.description: Drink deep from the cup of destruction.

4221925399.description: You stand at the head of the army.

4230993599.description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

4238497225.description: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

4255268456.description: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

4272442416.description: "Who will be the first to fall?" —Lakshmi-2

4288031461.description: The son's ambition will be his undoing.

4292849692.description: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin
